attributes.action: demand the resignation of Mark Byford, Deputy Director General responsible for News for failure to cover Climategate adequately
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Regardless of one's view on the science of climate change, Climategate is recognised widely as the most important science story in decades.
Since breaking on the 19th November, the BBC has failed to cover it as a news item within its main news programmes or on its news website. As head of BBC News, Mark Byford must be asked to resign in light of this critical editorial failure.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
